page.title: 16Mackie Hill First School
page.content: The scool opened in 1960. It was completed in three different stages. The third stage has yet to be completed,it is going to be a medical room,secretary's office and dining hall. When the school first opened it was the first stage of the school and the age group was 5 to 7. After the second stage it became 5 to 9. In september 1985 it will be 3 to 9 as a nursery is being built. Mrs Feiweles who has been Headmistress for 8 years has 150 pupils in her school. In 1978 Mackie Hill School had more children than they have ever had. They had 172 on roll,in contrast in 1981 they had the smallest number with 117 on roll. The have twice as many boys in the school as girls. They have 5 full time teachers and 1 part time teacher, With 5 classes.
